name: adaptation
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
C1 [ U ] the process of changing to suit different conditions: The documentary is about corruption, crime and human adaptation to difficult circumstances. His team's successful adaptation to life in the top-flight has come as no surprise.
[ C or U ]
  biology
  specialized the process in which a living thing changes slightly over time to be able to continue to exist in a particular environment, or a change like this: Evolution occurs as a result of adaptation to new environments. It's these evolutionary adaptations that make aphids and other insects so destructive.
[ C ] a film, book, play, etc. that has been made from another film, book, play, etc.: Last year he starred in the film adaptation of Bill Cronshaw's best-selling novel.
